trans-unit.source: Contains constants for controlling the kind of access other <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" /> objects can have to the same file.
trans-unit.target: 包含用于控制其他 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" /> 对象对同一文件可以具有的访问类型的常数。

trans-unit.source: For an example of creating a file and writing text to a file, see [How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md).
trans-unit.target: 创建一个文件并将文本写入文件的示例，请参阅[如何： 将文本写入到文件](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)。

trans-unit.source: For an example of reading text from a file, see [How to: Read Text from a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-text-from-a-file.md).
trans-unit.target: 从文件读取文本的示例，请参阅[如何： 从文件读取文本](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-text-from-a-file.md)。

trans-unit.source: For an example of reading from and writing to a binary file, see [How to: Read and Write to a Newly Created Data File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md).
trans-unit.target: 读取和写入二进制文件的示例，请参阅[如何： 读取和写入到新创建数据文件](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md)。

trans-unit.source: A typical use of this enumeration is to define whether two processes can simultaneously read from the same file.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举的一个典型用途是定义两个进程可以从同一个文件同时读取。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a file is opened and Read is specified, other users can open the file for reading but not for writing.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果打开文件并指定读取，其他用户可以打开以进行读取，但不是用于写入的文件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.FileShare.Read> parameter is specified in some of the constructors for <xref:System.IO.FileStream>, <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>, and in some of the `Open` methods of <xref:System.IO.File> and <xref:System.IO.FileInfo> to control how a file is opened.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.IO.FileShare.Read>在某些的构造函数指定参数<xref:System.IO.FileStream>， <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>，在某些的`Open`方法<xref:System.IO.File>和<xref:System.IO.FileInfo>来控制如何打开文件。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.IO.FileStream> constructor opens an existing file and grants read-only access to other users (Read).
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.IO.FileStream>构造函数打开一个现有文件，并向其他用户 （读取） 授予只读访问权限。

trans-unit.source: Allows subsequent deleting of a file.
trans-unit.target: 允许随后删除文件。

trans-unit.source: Makes the file handle inheritable by child processes.
trans-unit.target: 使文件句柄可由子进程继承。

trans-unit.source: This is not directly supported by Win32.
trans-unit.target: Win32 不直接支持此功能。

trans-unit.source: Declines sharing of the current file.
trans-unit.target: 谢绝共享当前文件。

trans-unit.source: Any request to open the file (by this process or another process) will fail until the file is closed.
trans-unit.target: 文件关闭前，打开该文件的任何请求（由此进程或另一进程发出的请求）都将失败。

trans-unit.source: Allows subsequent opening of the file for reading.
trans-unit.target: 允许随后打开文件读取。

trans-unit.source: If this flag is not specified, any request to open the file for reading (by this process or another process) will fail until the file is closed.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定此标志，则文件关闭前，任何打开该文件以进行读取的请求（由此进程或另一进程发出的请求）都将失败。

trans-unit.source: However, even if this flag is specified, additional permissions might still be needed to access the file.
trans-unit.target: 但是，即使指定了此标志，仍可能需要附加权限才能够访问该文件。

trans-unit.source: Allows subsequent opening of the file for reading or writing.
trans-unit.target: 允许随后打开文件读取或写入。

trans-unit.source: If this flag is not specified, any request to open the file for reading or writing (by this process or another process) will fail until the file is closed.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定此标志，则文件关闭前，任何打开该文件以进行读取或写入的请求（由此进程或另一进程发出）都将失败。

trans-unit.source: However, even if this flag is specified, additional permissions might still be needed to access the file.
trans-unit.target: 但是，即使指定了此标志，仍可能需要附加权限才能够访问该文件。

trans-unit.source: Allows subsequent opening of the file for writing.
trans-unit.target: 允许随后打开文件写入。

trans-unit.source: If this flag is not specified, any request to open the file for writing (by this process or another process) will fail until the file is closed.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定此标志，则文件关闭前，任何打开该文件以进行写入的请求（由此进程或另一进过程发出的请求）都将失败。

trans-unit.source: However, even if this flag is specified, additional permissions might still be needed to access the file.
trans-unit.target: 但是，即使指定了此标志，仍可能需要附加权限才能够访问该文件。
